about_the_game:
The Soulwalkers is a roguelike autobattler/autochess in a singleplayer format. Draft a team of units with synergizing traits that automatically fight your enemies. Carefully position your units, strategically place items, and assemble your squad. Tailor your gameplay by choosing your battles, unlocking special events, and discovering powerful boons.



Crafting the perfect team of champions is critical to achieving success on the battlefield. Each unit comes equipped with a distinctive set of traits and a powerful spell, providing you with endless possibilities for strategic combinations.

By fielding enough units of a specific trait, you'll unlock powerful bonuses that can shift the tide of battle in your favor. Stay flexible by regularly refreshing your champion shop and discovering new heroes to add to your arsenal. Choose your champions wisely and lead them to glorious victory!



Strategic decision-making is at the core of your journey, as every choice you make will have a profound impact on the outcome of your run. With a vast array of powerful boons to choose from, each playthrough will offer a distinct set of challenges and opportunities. Thoughtfully selecting which champions to equip with which items can make all the difference in your success on the battlefield.



Step into Soul Realm, where every fight presents a deadly modifier that can drastically alter the course of battle. Adaptability will be necessary, and only those who master the intricacies of their team composition will emerge victorious.

Along the way, you'll encounter a variety of special events, face off against formidable bosses, and uncover rare treasures and rewards. With each run offering a unique set of challenges and opportunities, the path to becoming a Soulwalker is paved with danger and excitement. Are you ready to embark on this perilous journey?
detailed_description:
WISHLIST MY OTHER AUTOBATTLER

name: The Soulwalkers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: A singleplayer roguelike autobattler/autochess. Draft a team of champions with synergizing traits that automatically fight your enemies. Carefully position your units and strategically place items. Tailor your gameplay by choosing your battles, finding special events, and discovering unique boons.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
